items.id: How-to Guides/Partner Centre/Setup an Azure Subscription from Partner Centre
items.title: Setup an Azure Subscription from Partner Centre
items.description: Description: Setup an Azure Subscription within Partner Centre for a customer. This has the added benefit of creating the PAL or DPOR link to earn partner credit.

items.description: Microsoft Article: Reinstate admin privileges for a customer's Azure CSP subscriptions.
